mapper.select: SELECT A.TEAM_COMMENT_ID , A.CONTENT , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.TEAM_POST_ID , A.USER_ID , B.USERNAME , B.POSITION FROM TBL_TEAM_COMMENT A INNER JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE TEAM_POST_ID = #{teamPostId} ORDER BY A.TEAM_COMMENT_ID DESC

SELECT a.team_comment_id AS team_comment_id, a.content AS content, a.created_at AS created_at, a.updated_at AS updated_at, a.team_post_id AS team_post_id, a.user_id AS user_id, b.username AS username, b.position AS position, c.title AS post_title FROM TBL_TEAM_COMMENT a INNER JOIN TBL_USER b ON a.user_id = b.user_id INNER JOIN TBL_TEAM_POST c ON a.team_post_id = c.team_post_id WHERE a.team_comment_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY a.team_comment_id DESC

SELECT a.team_comment_id AS team_comment_id, a.content AS content, a.created_at AS created_at, a.updated_at AS updated_at, a.team_post_id AS team_post_id, a.user_id AS user_id, b.username AS username, b.position AS position, c.title AS post_title FROM TBL_TEAM_COMMENT a INNER JOIN TBL_USER b ON a.user_id = b.user_id INNER JOIN TBL_TEAM_POST c ON a.team_post_id = c.team_post_id ORDER BY a.team_comment_id DESC
